title: Java at 30: Java Pioneers Look Back, Forward
author: Darryl K Taft
description: From surviving Oracle's acquisition to embracing AI development, industry veterans reveal how Java's blend of innovation and backward compatibility has kept it thriving through 30 years of technological upheaval.
cntitle: Java 30 周年：Java 先驱者的回顾与展望
cndescription: 从在 Oracle 收购中幸存下来到拥抱 AI 开发，行业资深人士揭示了 Java 如何通过创新和向后兼容的结合，使其在 30 年的技术变革中保持蓬勃发展。
